Summary:
Highly experienced Solutions Architect with a strong technical foundation in enterprise IT and a deep understanding of the Energy and Utilities industry. Proven track record of managing and leading teams, and the ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations. Togo certified and experienced in process and robotic automation.

Experience:

Solutions Architect
XYZ Company | Jan 2020 - Present

* Designed and implemented solutions for clients in the Energy and Utilities industry
* Worked closely with clients to understand their needs and develop custom solutions
* Led a team of engineers in the development and deployment of solutions
* Worked with sales team to develop and deliver technical presentations to potential clients
* Participated in the development of proposals and business cases

Senior Technical Leader
ABC Company | Apr 2015 - Dec 2019

* Led technical teams in the development and implementation of solutions for clients in the Energy and Utilities industry
* Worked closely with clients to understand their needs and develop custom solutions
* Participated in the development of proposals and business cases
* Assisted in the development and delivery of technical presentations to potential clients

Education:

* Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering, University of XYZ, 2011-2015

Skills:

* Strong technical foundation
